author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: Clarify API contract for repos merge
info retrieval.
* subversion/include/svn_repos.h
(svn_repos_fs_get_merge_info): Document that *MERGEINFO is set to
NULL when there is no merge info visible/available.

author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: A follow-up to r20709, re-aligning with
API guarantee that the value returned in *MERGEINFO is NULL (rather
than uninitialized) when there is no merge info.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_local/ra_plugin.c
(svn_ra_local__get_merge_info): Rename "tempmergeinfo" to
"tmp_mergeinfo" (so that it's easier to read).  Remove some
space-between-paren nonsense ;).  Set *MERGEINFO to NULL when no
merge info is available.

author: dberlin
msg: Make local parse mergeinfo as per the API docs
* subversion/libsvn_ra_local/ra_plugin.c: Include svn_mergeinfo.h.
(svn_ra_local__get_merge_info): Parse returned mergeinfo strings into hash.

author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch:
* TODO
(Phase 1): Handle 'copy' revs as merge info, and consolidate merge
info storage.

author: maxb
msg: * subversion/tests/libsvn_vcdiff: Remove ancient and unreferenced test data.
